attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to present this petition to the PM to ask that make-up testing on animals is banned, for good.  The make-up tests they run can lead to blistering, blindness, swelling, ulcers, unnecessary suffering and can lead to the death of many animals.  They start with rats and mice, and they work their way up to monkeys, causing many different types of animals to suffer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
